p: It outlines the example of how ethics review boards would ‘help mitigate the likelihood of creating ethically problematic designs’. The document emphasises the importance of stakeholder involvement in design, the importance of algorithmic transparency and recommend the use of human rights and algorithmic impact assessments. This chapter concludes with the recommendation that full documentation should accompany the final product that addresses auditability, accessibility, meaningfulness and readability and that systems are auditable.
